member.name: ISynchronizeContainer.AddSynchronize
member.summary: Adds a synchronization object to the container.
member.param: A pointer to the synchronization object to be added to the container. See .

returns.para: This method can return the standard return values E_INVALIDARG, E_OUTOFMEMORY, and E_FAIL, as well as the following values.

listheader.description: The synchronization object container is full.

member.name: ISynchronizeContainer.WaitMultiple
member.summary: Waits for any synchronization object in the container to be signaled or for a specified timeout period to elapse, whichever comes first.
member.param: The wait options. Possible values are taken from the enumeration. COWAIT_WAITALL is not a valid setting for this method.

The time this call will wait before returning, in milliseconds. If this parameter is INFINITE, the caller will wait until a synchronization object is signaled, no matter how long it takes. If this parameter is 0, the method returns immediately.
A pointer to an interface pointer on the synchronization object that was signaled. This parameter cannot be NULL.

returns.para: This method can return the standard return values E_INVALIDARG, E_OUTOFMEMORY, and E_FAIL, as well as the following values.

listheader.description: The time-out period elapsed before the synchronization object was signaled.
There are no synchronization objects in the container.

member.name: ISynchronizeContainer
member.summary: Manages a group of unsignaled synchronization objects.
